<< db2mag Signal Processing filter2 >>

db2pow

Convert a gain in decibels (dB) to power.

Syntax

pow = db2pow(db)

Input argument

db

input array: scalar, vector or matrix.

Output argument

pow

corresponding power

Description

pow = db2pow(db) returns corresponding power.

Example

pow = db2pow([0, -20])

See also

pow2db.

History

Version Description
1.0.0 initial version

Author

Allan CORNET
